include/nucleus/bind.h

00001 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_BIND_H
00002 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_BIND_H
00003 
00004 #include <stdio.h>
00005 #include <stdlib.h>
00006 #include <string.h>
00007 #include <errno.h>
00008 #include <signal.h>
00009 #include <pthread.h>
00010 #include <asm/xenomai/syscall.h>
00011 
00012 __attribute__ ((weak))
00013 int xeno_sigxcpu_no_mlock = 1;
00014 
00015 static void xeno_handle_mlock_alert(int sig)
00016 {
00017         if (xeno_sigxcpu_no_mlock) {
00018                 fprintf(stderr,
00019                         "Xenomai: process memory not locked (missing mlockall?)\n");
00020                 fflush(stderr);
00021                 exit(4);
00022         } else {
00023                 /* XNTRAPSW was set for the thread but no user-defined
00024                    handler has been set to override our internal handler, so
00025                    let's invoke the default signal action. */
00026                 struct sigaction sa;
00027 
00028                 sa.sa_handler = SIG_DFL;
00029                 sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
00030                 sa.sa_flags = 0;
00031                 sigaction(SIGXCPU, &sa, NULL);
00032                 pthread_kill(pthread_self(), SIGXCPU);
00033         }
00034 }
00035 
00036 static inline int
00037 xeno_user_skin_init(unsigned skin_magic, const char *skin, const char *module)
00038 {
00039         struct sigaction sa;
00040         xnfeatinfo_t finfo;
00041         int muxid;
00042 
00043 #ifdef xeno_arch_features_check
00044         xeno_arch_features_check();
00045 #endif /* xeno_arch_features_check */
00046 
00047         muxid = XENOMAI_SYSBIND(skin_magic,
00048                                 XENOMAI_FEAT_DEP, XENOMAI_ABI_REV, &finfo);
00049         switch (muxid) {
00050         case -EINVAL:
00051 
00052                 fprintf(stderr, "Xenomai: incompatible feature set\n");
00053                 fprintf(stderr,
00054                         "(required=\"%s\", present=\"%s\", missing=\"%s\").\n",
00055                         finfo.feat_man_s, finfo.feat_all_s, finfo.feat_mis_s);
00056                 exit(1);
00057 
00058         case -ENOEXEC:
00059 
00060                 fprintf(stderr, "Xenomai: incompatible ABI revision level\n");
00061                 fprintf(stderr, "(needed=%lu, current=%lu).\n",
00062                         XENOMAI_ABI_REV, finfo.abirev);
00063                 exit(1);
00064 
00065         case -ENOSYS:
00066         case -ESRCH:
00067 
00068                 fprintf(stderr,
00069                         "Xenomai: %s skin or CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE disabled.\n"
00070                         "(modprobe %s?)\n", skin, module);
00071                 exit(1);
00072         }
00073 
00074         if (muxid < 0) {
00075                 fprintf(stderr, "Xenomai: binding failed: %s.\n",
00076                         strerror(-muxid));
00077                 exit(1);
00078         }
00079 
00080         /* Install a SIGXCPU handler to intercept alerts about unlocked
00081            process memory. */
00082 
00083         sa.sa_handler = &xeno_handle_mlock_alert;
00084         sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
00085         sa.sa_flags = 0;
00086         sigaction(SIGXCPU, &sa, NULL);
00087 
00088         return muxid;
00089 }
00090 
00091 #endif /* _XENO_NUCLEUS_BIND_H */
